original_text: It happened, late one afternoon, when David arose from his couch and was walking on the roof of the king's house, that he saw from the roof a woman bathing; and the woman was very beautiful.
korean_text: 저녁 때에 다윗이 그의 침상에서 일어나 왕궁 옥상에서 거닐다가 그 곳에서 보니 한 여인이 목욕을 하는데 심히 아름다워 보이는지라

sentences.original_text: when David arose from his couch
and was walking on the roof of the king's house,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 집 지붕 위를 걷고 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: that he saw from the roof a woman bathing;
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 지붕에서 목욕하는 한 여자를 보았고;

sentences.original_text: and the woman was very beautiful.
